Shownu

Hyungwon

Introduction

SHOWNU X HYUNGWON (Korean: 셔누 X 형원; Japanese: ショヌ×ヒョンウォン) is the first official sub-unit of MONSTA X. The duo made their official debut on July 25th, with the mini album, "THE UNSEEN."
